org.hkijena.jipipe.api.registries

Class JIPipeSettingsRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hkijena.jipipe.api.registries.JIPipeSettingsRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JIPipeCustomParameterCollection, JIPipeParameterCollection

    public class JIPipeSettingsRegistry
extends Object
implements JIPipeParameterCollection, JIPipeCustomParameterCollection
    Registry for settings. Settings are organized in "sheets" (parameter collections)

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public void register(String id,
                     String name,
                     Icon icon,
                     String category,
                     Icon categoryIcon,
                     JIPipeParameterCollection parameterCollection)
        Registers a new settings sheet
        Parameters:
        id - unique ID of the sheet
        name - sheet name
        icon - sheet icon
        category - sheet category. If left null or empty, it will default to "General"
        categoryIcon - optional icon. If null, a wrench icon is used.
        parameterCollection - the object that holds the parameters

      • getSettings

        public <T extends JIPipeParameterCollection> T getSettings(String id,
                                                           Class<T> settingsClass)
        Gets the settings instance with given ID
        Type Parameters:
        T - the settings class
        Parameters:
        id - the ID
        settingsClass - the settings class
        Returns:
        the settings instance.

        public EventBus getEventBus()
        Description copied from interface: JIPipeParameterCollection
        Gets the event bus that posts events about the parameters
        Specified by:
        getEventBus in interface JIPipeParameterCollection
        Returns:
        The event bus triggering JIPipeParameterCollection.ParameterChangedEvent and JIPipeParameterCollection.ParameterStructureChangedEvent

      • getParameters

        public Map<String,JIPipeParameterAccess> getParameters()
        Description copied from interface: JIPipeCustomParameterCollection
        Returns all parameters Please note that those parameters must be sourced in this collection. Use getChildParameterCollections() to add those
        Specified by:
        getParameters in interface JIPipeCustomParameterCollection
        Returns:
        Map from parameter ID to its access. The ID is not necessarily equal to JIPipeParameterAccess.getKey()
